entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 7:50 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 45 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
